The success of UFDS comes from the amazing people involved â€” helpful project mentors and dedicated student fellows. Gretchen Moisen, who spent a 40 year career at FIA, helped create UFDS with Kelly and served as a project mentor for the first decade. Gretchen also coined the name! By the numbers, UFDS has involved 37 student fellows, 10 FIA collaborators, and 6 additional research mentors. Nowadays, the UFDS program occurs most summers and is co-directed by George Gaines, Kelly McConville, and Grayson White.
